attributes.action: Reduce VAT on domestic gas & electricity to 0% during the Covid pandemic.
attributes.additional_details: There are numerous articles and reports in relation to poverty within the UK, this is one small step that could help many.
attributes.background: As a population we are being told to stay at home. Children are educated from home, adults working from home, many are shielding at home. VAT is associated, by many with luxury items; warmth, light and the ability to cook food should not be a luxury at anytime. Let alone during a global pandemic.
